cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.util
Class JcopRandom

java.lang.Object
  cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.util.JcopRandom

public class JcopRandom
extends java.lang.Object

JcopRandom is wrapper around Random such that it removes the necessity to create lots of new Random() objects and it allows predictable behavior of whole application.

Method Detail

nextBoolean

public static boolean nextBoolean()
Provides access to Random.nextBoolean().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed boolean value from this random number generator's sequence

nextDouble

public static double nextDouble()
Provides access to Random.nextDouble().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed double value between 0.0 and 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence

nextFloat

public static float nextFloat()
Provides access to Random.nextFloat().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed double value between 0.0 and 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence

nextGaussian

public static double nextGaussian()
Provides access to Random.nextGaussian().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence

nextInt

public static int nextInt()
Provides access to Random.nextInt().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value from this random number generator's sequence

nextInt

public static int nextInt(int n)
Provides access to Random.nextInt(int).

Parameters:
n - the bound on the random number to be returned. Must be positive.
Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed int value between 0 (inclusive) and n (exclusive) from this random number generator's sequence

nextLong

public static long nextLong()
Provides access to Random.nextLong().

Returns:
the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed long value from this random number generator's sequence

Provides access to Random.setSeed(long) )}.
